subject: DHA
name: Freshman Seminar in DHA
fullname: Freshman Seminar in Design, Housing, and Apparel
info: Topic in design, housing, or apparel. Small-group seminar.

subject: DHA
name: Freshman Seminar
info: Special topics. Topics vary by term. See Class Schedule.

subject: DHA
name: Freshman Seminar: WI and CD
fullname: Freshman Seminar: Writing Intensive and Cultural Diversity
info: Issues related to design disciplines and cultural diversity.  Topics announced in advance. Small group seminar.

subject: DHA
name: Residential Tech
info: Survey of technological systems in housing. Emphasizes consumption/conservation of natural resources and energy sources. Human factor considerations in kitchen design.

subject: DHA
name: Field Study
info: Faculty-directed field study in a national or international setting.

subject: DHA
name: Design Minor Seminar
info: Students share ideas/conclusions with one another, create a summary statement (e.g., document, multi-media display, designed object) of a significant learning insight.

subject: DHA
name: Retail Promotion
info: Integration of communication/consumer behavior theories with elements of retail promotion. Advertising, sales promotions, point-of-purchase communications, personal selling.

subject: DHA
name: Fiber Dsgn Workshop
fullname: Woven, Knit, and Non-Woven Fiber Design Workshop
info: Studio experiences in the development and production of woven, knit, and non-woven fiber projects. Explore several design methods and complete a major project using one of the structure techniques.

subject: DHA
name: Materials
info: Focus on the relationship between the material of production and the design problem, and its most effective solution. Develop production skills in the specified medium while gaining a sensitivity to the material's expressive potential.

subject: DHA
name: Interactive Media
info: Design of interactive multi-media projects. Experience developing interactive presentations and electronic publishing. Software includes hypermedia, scripting, video/sound editing, animation, digital output.

subject: DHA
name: Hist of Dec Arts
info: In depth study of textiles, ceramics, metal, and glass from selected historical periods. Focus on the Goldstein Gallery collections.

subject: DHA
name: Digital Illustr
info: Integration of design with computer applications. Use of raster-/vector-based programs for illustration.

subject: DHA
name: Sound & Video
info: Design solutions involving time-based media. Emphasizes sound/video. Electronic publishing via Internet.

subject: DHA
name: Internet Media
info: Designing interactive presentations (using various operating systems) for Internet/Web. Electronic publishing. Development of internet-based communication.

subject: DHA
name: Intro to Drafting
info: Architectural drafting practice and the use of drafting instruments. Line conventions, lettering, orthographic drawings, paraline drawing, architectural symbols, and vocabulary as related to interior design.  (Independent and distance learning only.)

subject: DHA
name: Analysis Dsgn Lit
info: Classic and contemporary literature; visualization, creativity, and design methods literature.

subject: DHA
name: Historical Perspect
info: Dress as a significant factor in human interaction prior to 1940. Early social science and philosophical writing, beginning with Montaigne in 1537.  These perspectives appraised for relevance to current research and theory.

subject: DHA
name: Contemporary Themes
info: Current conceptualizations and thematic areas in literature of textiles and apparel.

subject: DHA
name: Dr Race Class Gend
info: Dressing the body as a sociocultural and personal expression of an individual's identity. Gender, race, and class differences in apparel explored to understand the global market, international and niche retailing, as related to clothing practices.
